## serialClose() function

This function closes the serial device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function serialClose(handle: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The serial device handle as returned by [serialOpen()](./lgpio.serialopen.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
